title: Win Opportunity Knocks Recalls Fresh and Frozen, Raw Ground Beef Products Due to Possible E. coli O45, O103 and O145 Contamination
summary: WASHINGTON, July 18, 2018 Win Opportunity Knocks, doing business as Ottomanelli Wholesale Meats Inc., a St. Petersburg, Fla. establishment, is recalling approximately 6,020 pounds of fresh and frozen, raw ground beef products that may be contaminated with Shiga toxin-producing E. coli (STEC) O45, O103 and...
